content: वारुण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [वरुणस्येदं अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to Varuṇa; साक्ष्येऽनृतं वदन् पाशैर्बध्यते वारुणैर्भृशं <ls>Ms. 8. 82.</ls> {@--2@} Dedicated or sacred to Varuṇa {@--3@} Given to Varuṇa. --णः <ab>N.</ab> of one of the nine divisions of Bhāratavarṣa. --णं Water.

वारुणी {@--1@} The west (the quarter presided over by Varuṇa). {@--2@} Any spirituous liquor; पयोपि शौडिकीहस्ते वारुणीत्यभिधीयते <ls>H. 3. 11</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 178</ls> (where both senses are intended); <ls>Ku. 4. 12.</ls> {@--3@} The asterism शतभिषज्. {@--4@} Dūrvā grass. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of Varuṇa. {@--6@} A kind of Dūrvā.
